alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 26 at 2:58PM AKST until March 01 at 3:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions and heavy snow possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Conditions over St. Lawrence Island will deteriorate Monday night and along the Bering Strait Coast Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could blow items around. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
